summary: I am a Computer Engineering new grad from Seneca College. Throughout my college, I gained experiences in Software Development and Networking. I'm also having realworl practical experience in Networking as IT Systems Technologist during my Co-op term. Besides, I'm very interested in Web development and having practical experience by building site project from Front-end, Back-end to Full-stack which popular language and frameworks such as JavaScript, React, NodeJS,ASP.NET, etc,.. After graduate, I decided join in Jarvis training program for Software Engineer position. Currently, I am looking for an greate environment where I can apply my technical and soft skill that I have learned, also a place where I am able to continue to improve myselft.
